articles.description: Controversy erupted once again in the Big Bash clash between Brisbane Heat and Sydney Thunder.
articles.content:
Adam Gilchrist was shocked that Usman Khawaja wasn't given out. Image: Fox Sports
The lack of DRS in the Big Bash League reared its ugly head again on Sunday night as cricket fans around the country… [+4099 chars]
